summary: Master Summoner and Winterhold's new student.
descriptionHtml:
A remastered, updated version of Alma is available at [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84639][u][color=#0066cc]XG Followers[/color][/u][/url]! Go get her there :)

This is my first mod ever! She is actually the character I am currently playing it, after starting a new game and spending, like, an entire hour creating her. Never thought of releasing my Alma as a follower, so blame Xannon98 for convincing me for doing so. Something about she being too lovely to be kept a secret and stuff.

Everything related to Alma was planned by me: spells, perks, voice, behaviour, combat style, affiliation, etc. As I never modded in my life, and Xannon98 wanted to learn as well, he "grabbed" Alma from my game, placed her in the CK and worked about the technical parts while teaching me how to get around that very confusing program. So, this means we would love to get some feedback and constructive criticism, because this is my first mod, and Xannon's second.
....................................................................................................................................

About Alma:
She's a Master Summoner, with the ability to use Destruction spells (Frost) as well. Her inventory includes a Master Conjuration Robe, a Nightingale Bow (very useful for enemies resistant to Frost or if she runs out of mana) and two Nightingale blades (she may actually dual wield provided you have the right mods, see below). She has more combat abilities, but you may prefer to see for yourself. She also levels up with the player (cap is 100).

Where to find her:
At Winterhold's College. She spends the morning studying at The Arcanaeum, the afternoon at the Hall of the Elements and her evenings at the Hall of Attainment, where she sleeps as well.

To have Alma look exactly like my screenshots you won't be needing any other mod, for she is completely standalone* if you use the latest version. For info about the mods included in Alma, consult the Credits section below. If you intend to leave swords in her inventory (she prefers to keep her distance, but may pull them out or the bow if she runs out of mana), then I recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13571]Dual Wield for Followers[/url].

*I have included an optional file with the tattoos in the "White Flower" screenshots, use it only with the latest main version and select "No" when prompted to upgrade in NMM.

I do hope you like her :) have fun! ^^

....................................................................................................................................

Credits - Special Thanks to the creators of these fantastic mods:

Hair and Face:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii SkyHair[/url] by apachii.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569]Univision Face[/url] by dd2501.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887]Pretty Face[/url] by tktk1.

Body:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]Dimonized UNP[/url] by dimon99.

Eyes:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11821]Purple Eyes[/url] by maxmuh.

Tattoo (optional file):
The elements used came from lokilife's [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7850]Tattoos for Female Body[/url] collection, which were assembled, edited and converted to the UNP body by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3552857]Xannon98[/url].

....................................................................................................................................

Change log:

Version 1.6
Minor texture fixes and compression, to improve performance while maintaining quality.

Version 1.5
Alma is now standalone, meaning you will not be required to use additional mods to have the look she has in the screenshots. Her combat AI has some minor improvements as well.
Install Instructions: Remove the items you gave Alma and dismiss her. Uninstall mod and replace with the new version (NMM friendly).

Version 1.4
Major improvements to her AI: she is not limited to Brelyna's room any longer, as she now has a proper and immersive student schedule, read the details above. Tweaked her combat AI as well.
Install Instructions: Remove the items you gave Alma and dismiss her. Uninstall mod and replace with the new version (NMM friendly).

Version 1.3
Improved perks and spell list to better adapt to player's current level.
Install Instructions: Just replace files.

Version 1.2
Minor tweaks to improve future updates.
Install Instructions: Remove the items you gave Alma and dismiss her. Uninstall mod and replace with the new version (NMM friendly). She will be waiting at the usual spot at the College.

Version 1.1
Fixed sleeping outfit - changed it to default, the previous one included a hood that will be quite difficult to get rid of if you don't have UFO installed.
Install Instructions: Remove her items if you had already equipped her and dismiss her. Uninstall mod and replace with the new version (NMM friendly). She will be waiting at the usual spot at the College.

Version 1.0
Initial release.

....................................................................................................................................

Legal/Permission: Contact-me by PM if you wish to include my mods into your own work. My work is a Nexus-exclusive, therefore I don't allow my mods to be uploaded to any other site. Please let me know if you find a "stolen" version of my mod in any other site. Thank you!

....................................................................................................................................

My other mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20520][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/1704/3552857-1498673899.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21042][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/1704/3552857-1497539704.png[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23461][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/1704/3552857-1498674576.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28972][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/3552857-1497540244.png[/img][/url]
author: Gweneal and Xannon98
